resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ibrahim 

I am an Android Developer. 

I specialized in using kotlin programming language to build responsive mobile solutions. 

My other interest spans across technologies like Cyber-Security, Artificial Intelligence and BlockChain Engineering. 

I bagged a B.Sc in Electronic and Electrical Engineering from Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife, Nigeria. 

When I am not coding, I would definitely be found chilling with family and friends. 

Feel free to reach out to me to chat about tech or just to say hi.
